characters.name: Shadow Ronin
characters.description: A silent swordsman with unmatched speed and skill.

characters.name: Cyber Ninja
characters.description: Master of stealth and digital illusions.

characters.name: Flame Dancer
characters.description: Controls fire with acrobatic attacks.

characters.name: Crystal Mage
characters.description: Manipulates crystals for offense and defense.

characters.name: Iron Monk
characters.description: Unbreakable defense and devastating punches.

characters.name: Wind Archer
characters.description: Strikes with arrows faster than the eye can see.

characters.name: Thunder Beast
characters.description: Wild warrior channeling electric energy.

characters.name: Void Assassin
characters.description: Moves through shadows to strike unseen.

characters.name: Aqua Sorceress
characters.description: Wields water spells with elegance and precision.

characters.name: Earth Titan
characters.description: Massive strength and nearly indestructible body.

characters.name: Light Paladin
characters.description: Protects allies with radiant shields.

characters.name: Dark Reaper
characters.description: Harvests the souls of defeated enemies.

characters.name: Storm Samurai
characters.description: Combines blade skill with storm magic.

characters.name: Steel Gunner
characters.description: Heavy artillery and pinpoint accuracy.

characters.name: Sky Dancer
characters.description: Controls air currents to fly and strike.

characters.name: Shadow Monk
characters.description: Blends martial arts with shadow techniques.

characters.name: Frost Queen
characters.description: Freezes enemies with icy touch.

characters.name: Solar Knight
characters.description: Charges attacks with solar energy.

characters.name: Mystic Alchemist
characters.description: Uses potions and transmutation in battle.

characters.name: Phantom Blade
characters.description: Untraceable swordsman with illusion techniques.
